item.description:
BECAUSE THIS EVENT WAS REQUESTED BY SEVERAL NATIVES:

The Movie 42 is out. This is the life story of Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and his history making signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers under the guidance of Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford).

All baseball and history fans should see this movie.

Movie run time is 2 hours and 8 minutes.

Reviews are out everywhere.

We will watch the 12:30pm showing at Showcase Cinema in Woburn next to Scoreboard.

Meet in the lobby or at the ticket collection entry line by 12:15pm.

Optional shenanigans or lunch at Scoreboard after the movie.
item.how_to_find_us: In the Lobby in front of the entrance where tickets are collected
item.name: 42 - The Jackie Robinson Movie at Showcase Cinema, Woburn
